citeinfo.origin: Natural Lands Trust with input data from PA DEP.
citeinfo.title: Contiguous Grasslands

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows 2000 Version 5.0 (Build 2195) Service Pack 4; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.1.0.722

procstep.procdesc:
Process: Create Grassland land cover grid Reclassify input: " 'study area'_LC_2000" (use most recent land cover) field: value
Old Value New Value 1 (water No Data ` 2 (Low Dens Urban) No Data 3 (High Dens Urban) No Data 4 (Hay Pasture) 1 5 (Row Crops) No Data 6 not in area ----- 7 (Coniferous Forest) No Data 8 (Mixed Forest) No Data 9 (Deciduous Forest) No Data 10 (Woody Wetland) No Data 11 (Emergent Wetland) No Data 12 (Quarries) No Data 13 (Coal Mine) No Data 14 not in area ---- 15 transitional No Data
save as: " 'study area'_Grassland" in \'study area'\individual_grid \landcover_grassland\
Multiply Buffered Landscape Blocks x Natural Vegetation land cover makes a grid where the no data/buffer of landblock is removed from Natural Vegetation Raster calc: (['study area'_landblock] x ['study area'_Grassland]) save as: " 'study area'_Grassla_LB" in \'study area'\individual_grid\Grassland_landcover_by_landblock_multiply\
Perform Region Group Region group assigns a unique number to each group of adjacent cells with the same value Raster calc: Region Group ({'study area'_Grassla_LB]) save as: " 'study area'_Grassla_RG" in \'study area'\individual_grid \Grassland_landcover_by_landblock_regiongroup\
Perform Zonal Area Zonal Area assigns area in square meters (using UTM meters) to unique numbers Raster calc: Zonal Area (['study area'_Grassla_RG]) save as: " 'study area'_Grassla_ZA" in \'study area'\individual_grid \Grassland_Landcover_by_Landblock_zonalarea\
Convert area to Acres Raster calc: (['study area'_Grassla_ZA] / 4050) Save as: " 'study area'_Grassla_Ac" in \study area \individual_grid \ Grassland_Landcover_by_Landblock_acreage\
Reclassify to assign conservation value (peer/biological) Use 'study area' as mask
Old Value New Value 0-25 0 25-160 1 160-250 3 250-400 4 >400 5

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.
